name: Rewind / Fast Forward
description:
Play as Doug & Bong, cute cartoon characters running away from the dreadful Rewind. Switch colors at the right time to get past the obstacles and be the first to reach the end of the episode !

Rewind / Fast forward is a competitive platformer game you can play with a friend in local multiplayer. It was created during a game jam.

This game is for 1 or 2 players.

To play with another person, you will need 2 Xbox controllers.

To play solo, you can either chose between keyboard or Xbox controller.

XBox controlsKeyboard controlsLeft stick to move
A to jump
LT to switch colors
RT to dash
Select to restart
Start to quit
Arrows to move
Space to jump F to switch colors
D to dash
Return to restart
Escape to quit
